fig.label: Fig. 2

caption.p: Evolution of the family Bromoviridae. Unrooted phylogenetic network illustrating the evolutionary history of the family Bromoviridae. The different viral species in the family are linked to each other via multiple paths of interconnecting network rather than as single tree, which suggests the effects of recombination and reassortment events.

fig.attrib: Figure reproduced from Codoner, F.M., Elena, S.F., 2008. The promiscuous evolutionary history of the family Bromoviridae. Journal of General Virology 89, 1739â€“1747 with permission (modified by C. Fauquet).
